Vigilance
When Royal Templar enters, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance and indestructible until end of turn.

rules_text2:
Vigilance
Whenever this creature transforms into Crown Betrayer or another permanent you control transforms, Crown Betrayer gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn.
